tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

DynamicSortSubtable.description: true or false, set this parameter to true when using dynamic for_each + toset to configure and sort sub-tables, please do not set this parameter when configuring static sub-tables.

Elasticbuffer.description: Enable/disable elasticbuffer support for all DPDK ports. Valid values: `disable`, `enable`.

HugepagePercentage.description: Percentage of main memory allocated to hugepages, which are available for DPDK operation.

MbufpoolPercentage.description: Percentage of main memory allocated to DPDK packet buffer.

Multiqueue.description: Enable/disable multi-queue RX/TX support for all DPDK ports. Valid values: `disable`, `enable`.

SleepOnIdle.description: Enable/disable sleep-on-idle support for all FDH engines. Valid values: `disable`, `enable`.

Status.description: Enable/disable DPDK operation for the entire system. Valid values: `disable`, `enable`.

Vdomparam.description: Specifies the vdom to which the resource will be applied when the FortiGate unit is running in VDOM mode. Only one vdom can be specified. If you want to inherit the vdom configuration of the provider, please do not set this parameter.
